entities.description: Predicted probability of Serious Mental Illness (SMI) using the model parameter estimates.
Predicted Serious Mental Illness indicator based on predicted SMI probability.
Predicted Serious Mental Illness Probability (Prediction Year).
Predicted Serious Mental Illness indicator based on predicted SMI probability (Prediction Year).
Predicted Any Mental Illness indicator based on predicted AMI probability.
Predicted Any Mental Illness Probability (Prediction Year).
Predicted Less Mild Mental Illness indicator based on predicted LMI probability.
Predicted Less Mild Mental Illness Probability (Prediction Year).
Any Mental Illness, defined as having a diagnosable mental, behavioral, or emotional disorder.
Serious Mental Illness, a subset of AMI limited to those with a resulting serious functional impairment.

relationships.description: Relates the predicted probability of SMI to the model used for the prediction.
Defines the point at which the probability is cut to classify respondents into positive or negative categories.
Indicates that the SMI predictor variable is based on the predicted probability of SMI.
Indicates that the AMI predictor variable is based on the predicted probability of SMI.
Indicates that Serious Mental Illness (SMI) is a subset of Any Mental Illness (AMI).
